line_1: That so little affection is shew'd to the cows:
line_2: The whole village cry shame when a milking she goes,

line_1: Homeward as they drive the cows.
Lost by this fatal sickness all my cows:
line_2: My barns are half unthatch'd, until'd my house,

line_1: With well-known halloo calls his lazy cows:
line_2: Straight to the meadow then he whistling goes:

line_1: And she with Joy resigns her brindl'd Cows:
line_2: Prefers the Damsel to attend his Spouse,
